themes: gender bias in music and nightlife
pay inequity for women and gender-expansive individuals
lack of opportunities and access to resources
underrepresentation in leadership and venue ownership
key_phrases: women or gender-expansive folks being judged harsher than male counterparts
not being given opportunities as easily as male counterparts
being paid less than male counterparts
receiving payment later than male counterparts
not having the same access to resources as male counterparts
general nightlife safety issues (being drugged, being touched inappropriately or worse…)
lack of gender diversity in venue ownership and other positions of power
pervasive community idea that men are better suited for leadership positions
barriers_identified: harsher judgment for women and gender-expansive individuals
fewer opportunities for women and gender-expansive individuals
lack of gender diversity in venue ownership and leadership
stereotypes about men being better suited for leadership
